Question: This person formulated a presentation of his beliefs and published it in 1728.
Hints: This person conceived the idea of a subscription library, which would pool the funds of the members to buy books for all to read.
This person was born on Milk Street, in Boston, Massachusetts, on January 17, 1706 and baptized at Old South Meeting House.
This person found out about Temple (as he called him), his only patrilineal grandson, on his second mission to England.
